dt: {bc}a representation of Christ on the cross

et: Middle English, from Late Latin {it}crucifixus{/it} the crucified Christ, from {it}crucifixus{/it}, past participle of {it}crucifigere{/it} to crucify, from Latin {it}cruc-, crux{/it} + {it}figere{/it} to fasten {ma}{mat|fix|}{/ma}
shortdef: a representation of Christ on the cross
